channel.title: phd on Ryan Moodie
channel.description: Recent content in phd on Ryan Moodie

item.title: YTF20 presentation: introduction to precision QCD
item.description: I was on the committee for the YTF 2019 and YTF 2020 conferences. For YTF20, I also gave a non-specialist talk on precision QCD. The talk is recorded and the slides are available here (source) (discussion of tech).

item.title: CV update
item.description: When applying to the SAGEX School in Mathematica and Maple, I had to provide a CV, which was good motivation to update my CV (source) and current research statement (source).

item.title: Outreach with a Galton board
item.description: At the IPPP, I’m involved with the outreach programme. Aside from helping to run events, I also did a bit of maintenance on the Galton board exhibit, which I wrote about on our Computing Club website. In recent quarantined times, I experimented with a virtual version (source), which I discussed here.

item.title: BUSSTEPP presentation: precision QCD with diphotons
item.description: I attended British Universities Summer School in Theoretical Elementary Particle Physics 2019. We all gave a short presentation of our research. Here are my slides (alt) (source).

item.title: PhD first year report: real QCD corrections
item.description: The time has come for my first year progress assessment. Here’s my report.

item.title: PhD applications
item.description: I’m applying for PhDs just now. Have a look at my CV or statement of purpose if you like.
